name: old-amber
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an aerodactyl.
short_effect: Can be revived into an Aerodactyl.

flavor_text.emerald: A stone containing the genes of an ancient POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A piece of amber that contains the genes of an ancient POKéMON. It is clear with a reddish tint.
